text: Mahabub Hossain Roksy (; born 10 October 1975) is a Bangladeshi football coach and former national team player. ==Coaching career== Roksy is now the head coach of Sheikh Jamal Dhanmondi Club in Bangladesh Football Premier League. He is now also assisting head coach Andrew Ord of Bangladesh national football team.
